item.title: Tekton安装及Hello world
item.description: 安装 kubectl apply --filename https://storage.googleapis.com/tekton-releases/pipeline/latest/release.yaml 检查安装的tekton相关的CRD: kubectl api-resources | grep tekton clustertasks tekton.dev false ClusterTask conditions tekton.dev true Condition pipelineresources tekton.dev true
